description.value:
You add two new wizard encounter attack powers to your spellbook. The powers must be of 23rd level or lower, and the two function as daily attack powers for you.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.70xs2dDOM3yz6oPJ]{Chain Lightning}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ViXhykOnoEGw4P12]{Deceptive Shadows}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.kYK7bAIiCh0FTGru]{Thunderclap}
